name: Car Drifting Games: Drift 3D
description:
Grab you sports car steering and try different drift by your wish!
Play the most wanted drift game 202q in this drifting simulator. Car Drift is not for the weak hearted! Let the adrenaline rush hit you in the most realistic mobile racing game. Drive Car to get the ultimate experience of drift car racing in extreme car simulator.
Game Features:
- Realistic Physics
- Extreme 3D environment.
- New Model Cars.
- Nitro for furious drive.
- Feasible Controls.
- Eye-catchy looks.
